value.title: StarCraft 2: Dark's OVERWHELMING Aggression... Backfires!
value.excerpt: In this video I cast a StarCraft 2 match between Dark, a Korean Zerg player, and Cyan, a Chinese Protoss player. value.title: StarCraft 2: Dark's ULTRA RUSHES Clem! (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: In this StarCraft 2 cast, we watch a thrilling match between Dark, the Korean Zerg master, and Clem, the French Terran.
